channel.title: Trecherus laser trap
channel.description: So in the multiplayer I have been expiencing a bug where if you you deploy a laser trap and non enemy passes through it for 5 minutes or so, the next time you go through this trap you deployed, it exploeds on you for no reason. I know so because it happend to me for 5 times allready and no enemy shot it.

item.title: Trecherus laser trap
item.dc:creator: Wristwatch4
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

To make this clearer to players, we colour coded the tripmines in TDM. Tripmines belonging to you have blue lasers (so you can kill yourself with them, watch out!). Tripmines placed by other players are colour coded. Green for Marines, Orange for Scientists.

O that’s why mine aren’t orange/green! I though it was an alt placement mode. Thanks for clearing that up.

Read full topic

item.title: Trecherus laser trap
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
If you are playing TDM, your teammates cannot trigger your tripmines. You are able to trigger your own tripmines though, so you need to be careful!

To make this clearer to players, we colour coded the tripmines in TDM. Tripmines belonging to you have blue lasers (so you can kill yourself with them, watch out!). Tripmines placed by other players are colour coded. Green for Marines, Orange for Scientists.

Read full topic

item.title: Trecherus laser trap
item.dc:creator: _DFS_darth_melek
item.description:
So in the multiplayer I have been expiencing a bug where if you you deploy a laser trap and non enemy passes through it for 5 minutes or so, the next time you go through this trap you deployed, it exploeds on you for no reason. I know so because it happend to me for 5 times allready and no enemy shot it.

Read full topic
